user.About: An undergrad CSE student from India, passionate about building innovative projects and learning new technologies like AI, ML, and Deep Learning. I also enjoy exploring the universe, frontend development, photography, and sketching - always seeking to create and discover something new!

RandomAboutText: Things I have Built (I am also maintaining themðŸ˜‘)

Things like 'Completed Projects' doesn't exsist in my life as I got an idea about a project and I start working on them. There's always something there which I find that can be improved. So every project is ongoing.

exp1.description: Participated in HacktoberFest 2023 and contributed to open source projects and made 4 pull requests accepted and merged.

exp2.description: As a Student Ambassador, I organised workshops in my community with Lets Upgrade support, shared tech experiences and promoted free resources offered by Lets Upgrade

exp3.description: Work as Scholar Trainee under Work Integrated Learning Program (WILP) , which offers Scholarship to pursue BTech from BITS, pilani along with Wipro's work culture.

project1.name: LearnIT
project1.description: An open source free of cost learning platform for all the computer science students pursuing their diplomas.

project2.name: LECTURE2NOTES
project2.description: It is a simple command-line python app that can record the notes or speaked lessons of teacher and convert them into Pdf Notes.

project3.name: HIRO
project3.description: Your Personal Healthcare Companion :D.It's a healthcare chatbot that uses Naive Bayes , Decision Tree Classifier and Random Forest Classifier to predict the disease by extracting symptoms from the user's prompt

project4.name: Colab Web Server
project4.description: A simple tool to use Google Colab as backend to host web apps. This project includes a flask web app that runs on google colab and a python scripts that sends your response to endpoint and fetches the response from flask app.
project4.tech_stack: Cloud Computing, Web APIs, Python, Jupyter

project5.name: LAN-Analysis
project5.description: A Python-based local web app with a React.js UI that analyzes a star topology LAN network, providing details on connected devices, bandwidth usage, network interfaces, Wi-Fi, vEthernet, and DNS server information.
